attributes.action: STOP the Rail Strikes by legislation!
attributes.background: For too long the RMT has caused misery to the daily lives of millions of rail users. They have lied, mislead rail users the public and even their own members! People’s daily lives should not be held to ransom in order to undermine and break the franchising system in favor of re-nationalization.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government and Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly how you would like the law on taking strike action changed.
